# Table Takers

> A personal blog and TTRPG session report repository.

## About
This site hosts session reports for various TTRPG campaigns, including "Kingmaker" (Pathfinder 2e) and "Wanda in the Dungeons" (Colostle/Solo RPG). It also contains reviews and thoughts on game design and systems.

## Context for AI Agents
- **Primary Content:** TTRPG Session Reports, Game Reviews, RPG Theory.
- **Key Campaigns:** 
    - Kingmaker (Pathfinder 2e)
    - Wanda in the Dungeons (Colostle)
- **Author:** Ahobo
- **Technical Stack:** Built with Hugo, hosted on GitHub Pages.

## Navigation
- /blog/ - General RPG thoughts and reviews.
- /posts/ - TTRPG session reports (ordered chronologically).
- /tags/ - Categorized by game system and topic.

## Metadata Structure
Most session reports contain structured front-matter:
- `campaign`: The name of the TTRPG campaign.
- `game`: The game system used (e.g., Pathfinder 2e).
- `session`: The session number.
